gw.api.json

Class JsonAccess<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.json.JsonAccess<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the Java type for access

    public class JsonAccess<T>
extends java.lang.Object
    Specific kinds of JSON access, e.g. JsonAccess.OBJECT.test(object), JsonAccess.STRING.getArray(object) These include any possible Java types that can be deserialized by JsonDataConverter.stringToObject()

      • typeKey

        @NotNull
public static <TK extends TypeKey> @NotNull JsonAccess<TK> typeKey(@NotNull
                                                                            @NotNull java.lang.Class<TK> typeKeyClass)
        Access for testing and getting against a specific type list
        Type Parameters:
        TK - the typelist, e.g., typekey.Currency.class
        Parameters:
        typeKeyClass - the typelist, e.g., typekey.Currency.class
        Returns:
        Access object

      • test

        public final boolean test(@Nullable
                          @Nullable java.lang.Object object)
        Determines if an object is valid for the given Access, e.g., JsonAccess.INTEGER.test(...)
        Parameters:
        object - the object to test, null is not valid
        Returns:
        true if the object is valid for the Access, false otherwise

      • testArray

        public final boolean testArray(@Nullable
                               @Nullable java.lang.Object object)
        Determines if an object is an array valid for the given Access, e.g., JsonAccess.STRING.testArray(...)

        An array is only valid if all elements are either null or satify test(java.lang.Object) and are consistent with each other, e.g., an array of scalars of all integers or all strings would be ok, but not an array of scalars of some integers and some strings.

        Parameters:
        object - the object to test, null for the array is not valid, but null elements are ok
        Returns:
        true if the object is a valid array for the Access, false otherwise

      • get

        @Nullable
public final T get(@Nullable
                             @Nullable java.lang.Object obj)
        Casts an object the accessor's type and guarantees that the object is null or is a valid
        Parameters:
        obj - an object, null is valid
        Returns:
        null or an object of type T
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if obj is not null and test(java.lang.Object) fails

      • getArray

        @Nullable
public final @Nullable java.util.List<T> getArray(@Nullable
                                                            @Nullable java.lang.Object obj)
        Casts an object to an array of the accessor's type and guarantees that the object is null or is a valid array
        Parameters:
        obj - an object, null is valid
        Returns:
        null or an object of type List<T>
        Throws:
        java.lang.ClassCastException - if obj is not null but testArray(java.lang.Object) fails
